text: The Joshua Tree is the fifth album by Irish rock band U2. It was released on March 9, 1987. ==Track listing== * Track 4, "I Still Haven't Found What I'm Looking For", includes a snippet of "Exodus" by Bob Marley and the Wailers at the end of the song. The snippet is not included on the CD and vinyl track list but is listed on some streaming services. Category:U2 albums Category:1987 albums Category:Grammy Award-winning albums
title: The Joshua Tree
